rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
增强老年人的深度睡眠可以预防痴呆症一项研究表明，对于 60 岁以上的人来说，每年深度睡眠减少 1%，患痴呆症的风险就会增加 27%，该研究表明，增强或维持深度睡眠（也称为慢波睡眠），年长时可以预防痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Enhancing-deep-sleep-in-older-years-could-stave-off-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Enhancing-deep-sleep-in-older-years-could-stave-off-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec4d0b39-d3fb-402f-aa1d-6319cfb06bb5 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:22:30 -0400 Enhancing deep sleep in older years could stave off dementia
俄亥俄大学科学家获​​得 180 万美元资金建立研究中心，以解决环境压力因素对儿童健康的影响俄勒冈大学的研究人员获得了美国环境保护署的 180 万美元拨款，用于建立一个研究中心，以解决农业和非化学品接触对儿童的累积健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/OU-scientists-receive-2418-million-to-built-research-center-to-address-childrens-health-impacts-from-environmental-stressors。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/OU-scientists-receive-2418-million-to-built-research-center-to-address-childrens-health-impacts-from-environmental-stressors。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a00c3f0c-dc21-4607-a326-478843bd8ecb Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:15:11 -0400 OU scientists receive $1.8 million to establish research center to address children's health impacts from environmental stressors
研究揭示了更精确、更持久、毒性更低的癌症治疗新方法长期以来，癌症治疗一直是一把双刃剑——旨在杀死癌细胞的治疗方法也常常对健康细胞造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-unveils-new-approach-to-more-precise-long- permanent-and-less-毒-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-unveils-new-approach-to-more-precise-long- permanent-and-less-毒-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b517fdcb-e16e-4454-b1ad-eb8c7a3bde20 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:10:46 -0400 Study unveils new approach to more precise, long-lasting, and less toxic cancer treatment
NCCN 发布新资源以改善癌症患者的生活质量国家综合癌症网络® (NCCN®) 宣布推出新资源，重点关注改善癌症患者的生活质量，同时确保护理计划反映个人需求和优先事项。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/NCCN-releases-new-resources-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/NCCN-releases-new-resources-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a1d1f50-153d-43af-8054-23d2f2548f63 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:04:37 -0400 NCCN releases new resources to improve quality of life for people with cancer
更新工具包以指导全球更年期护理莫纳什大学主导的更新工具包发布后，全球对患有更年期健康问题的女性的护理应该得到改善，该工具包指导世界各地的卫生专业人员评估和治疗这些问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Updated-toolkit-to-guide-global-menopause-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Updated-toolkit-to-guide-global-menopause-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9983c936-93af-4361-b48f-d011c8de2986 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 14:01:39 -0400 Updated toolkit to guide global menopause care
发现常驻Tregs在某些淋巴结中停留很长时间免疫系统在对抗病毒、细菌和其他病原体时速度很快。但它也必须知道何时不攻击 - 例如，花粉或室内灰尘等无害物质，否则会引发过敏反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Resident-Tregs-found-to-remain-in-certain-lymph-nodes-for-a-long-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Resident-Tregs-found-to-remain-in-certain-lymph-nodes-for-a-long-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc0b33a7-678c-4d9d-a9e4-f33721ab9667 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 13:38:16 -0400 Resident Tregs found to remain in certain lymph nodes for a long time
俄克拉荷马大学科学家获​​得近 100 万美元奖金，以推进计算基因组学研究Marmar Moussa 博士是俄克拉荷马大学计算机科学教授助理教授，她从美国国立卫生研究院获得了近 100 万美元的奖金，以推进她在计算基因组学方面的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Oklahoma-scientist-secures-nearly-241-million-award-to-advance-research-in-computational-genomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Oklahoma-scientist-secures-nearly-241-million-award-to-advance-research-in-computational-genomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87f0c8c9-ed4f-4760-8c23-41245426cf59 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 13:09:44 -0400 University of Oklahoma scientist secures nearly $1 million award to advance research in computational genomics
多种肠道细菌与患严重疟疾的风险增加有关印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员发现了多种细菌，当它们存在于肠道中时，会增加人类和小鼠患严重疟疾的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Multiple-species-of-gut-bacteria-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developmenting-severe-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Multiple-species-of-gut-bacteria-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developmenting-severe-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=153dbdd4-4f91-456c-90f6-41f710710a1c Mon, 30 Oct 2023 13:04:18 -0400 Multiple species of gut bacteria linked to increased risk of developing severe malaria
英国生物银行的慈善资金增加谷歌前首席执行官兼董事长埃里克·施密特 (Eric Sc​​hmidt) 和 Citadel 创始人兼首席执行官兼 Griffin Catalyst 创始人肯·格里芬 (Ken Griffin) 今天（10 月 30 日星期一）被宣布为新联盟的首批成员，该联盟将塑造最佳的未来。一流的英国生物银行，起始资金为 1600 万英镑，由政府配套。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Philanthropic-funding-boost-for-UK-Biobank.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Philanthropic-funding-boost-for-UK-Biobank.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8fcf5fd-0f4b-4036-b827-3143d7abb568 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 12:58:17 -0400 Philanthropic funding boost for UK Biobank
UKHSA 宣布试点计划监测英格兰疗养院的感染情况英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 今天宣布了一项试点计划，以监测英格兰疗养院的感染情况。新的试点项目建立在维瓦尔第研究在大流行期间取得成功的基础上，并具有更广泛的范围来研究其他感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/UKHSA-announces-pilot-scheme-to-monitor-infections-in-care-homes-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/UKHSA-announces-pilot-scheme-to-monitor-infections-in-care-homes-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=565c29ff-6ed8-4d76-996e-4eb314b303f9 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 12:53:32 -0400 UKHSA announces pilot scheme to monitor infections in care homes in England
